data.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Legend of Bagger Vance with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
47 Metascore

2000

2 hr 7 mins

Drama, Fantasy

PG13

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Robert Redford directed this magical fable about a golfer (Matt Damon) who returns from WWI with post-traumatic stress disorder. He does get a chance to turn his life around, however, when he receives a visit from a mysterious caddy (Will Smith). Charlize Theron, Bruce McGill, Joel Gretsch, J. Michael Moncrief, Lane Smith.
